news.title: The Local Algorithm: Relevance, Proximity, and Prominence
news.description: This breakdown of Google's local pack outlines the three factors that have always driven the algorithm and therefore local rankings: relevance, proximity, and prominence.

news.title: Google Search Console Can More Accurately Report On Indexed Pages
news.description: An update to Google Search Console has resulted in some pages that were previously categorized as crawled but not indexed being indexed from December 15 onward.

news.title: Google: We Ignore Links From Sites Where Links Are Unlikely To Be Natural
news.description: Googleâ€™s John Mueller has stated that there is no need to disavow links from spammy domains, as Google already disregards them because they are not likely to be natural.

news.title: How Does Website Security Affect Your SEO?
news.description: It is more critical than ever for developers to shore up website security for SEO purposes by using an HTTPS domain distinction and preventing blacklisting through link spam.
